predicates.name: author_of
predicates.description: True when a person is the author of a specific work (e.g., book, movie, song).

predicates.name: located_at
predicates.description: True when an entity is located at a specific place or location.

predicates.name: part_of
predicates.description: True when one entity is part of another (e.g., a car is part of a fleet).

predicates.name: type_of
predicates.description: True when an entity has a specific type or category.

predicates.name: created_by
predicates.description: True when a work was created by a specific person (e.g., artist, writer).

predicates.name: published_on
predicates.description: True when a work was published on a specific date.
